Class Mat4

  • java.lang.Object
    • math.Mat4

extends java.lang.Object
    4x4 Matrix operations

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Mat4()
      Identity matrix constructed as default
      Mat4​(float m00, float m01, float m02, float m03, float m10, float m11, float m12, float m13, float m20, float m21, float m22, float m23, float m30, float m31, float m32, float m33)
      Element-wise Matrix constructor
      Mat4​(Mat3 mat)
      Extends 3x3 matrix to 4x4 matrix (with a fourth homogeneous coordinate)
      Mat4​(Mat4 mat)
      Creates a 4x4 matrix by copying another 4x4 matrix
      Mat4​(Vec3 xAxis, Vec3 yAxis, Vec3 zAxis)
      Matrix build of axis vectors and homogeneous coordinates
      Mat4​(Vec3 xAxis, Vec3 yAxis, Vec3 zAxis, Vec3 translation)
      Creates matrix of homogeneous coordinates and combines it with translation vector

                               float width,
                               float height,
                               float zNear,
                               float zFar)
        Creates perspective (projection) matrix.
        Parameters:
        verticalFov - vertical field of view angle in degrees
        width - width of projected image
        height - height of projected image
        zNear - near plane of the view frustum
        zFar - far plane of the view frustum
        Returns:
        perspective matrix

        public boolean equals​(java.lang.Object obj)
        Compares this matrix with another object (if the object is also a Mat4 make an element-wise comparison)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        true: object is equal and has the same values as this matrix false: object is unequal
